question: What are the technology adoption trends among companies in the financial services industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the financial services industry by querying the CompanyInfo table for relevant industry classification.
Gather the technology stack information for the identified companies by joining the CompanyInfo table with the CompanyTechStack table to see what technologies are being utilized.
Analyze the vendor product details linked to the identified companies to understand the types of vendor technologies being adopted by functioning financial services companies.
Compile the social media engagement data related to these companies to see if there is any correlation between technology adoption and public engagement in the financial services industry.
Summarize the findings and trends regarding technology adoption in the financial services sector, considering both internal (direct technology usage) and external (vendor products) perspectives.
